Text: there seems to be no english subtitles. Pls help
Is that true?Arent English subs unavailable?can any1 provide link?

Subs MUST have the same name as the film.

This file should be the English subs --> Se.jie.[Lust.Caution].2007.Uncut.BRRip.H264.AAC.Gopo_EN.srt

You need to rename it --> Se.jie.[Lust.Caution].2007.Uncut.BRRip.H264.AAC.Gopo.srt

But there's already a file with that name, so change that filename slightly before you rename the English file.

This will screw up your seeding a little, but I think the film will seed okay. Change the names back after you view the film and it will seed okay.
Just drag the Subtitle file to the Player.

@vevdare 
there is english sub in the folder
